comment.body:
Hi! Are your tracker is alive?
I've added to cjdns config your data, set tracker in tracker list, set external ipv6 address to external_ips, but in tracker list system said "Invalid response" None
@Kaffie: Okay, thanks for reply. CJDNS node is alive, but tracker seems to be not. Just wanted to test it. I'll read about plugin.
